text:
Breaks my heart to see the pain of this mom & dad and the tragic loss of their little girl

Praying for Secoriya Williamson, Charmaine Turner & their beautiful 8-year-old, Secoreia, who should still be here along with the other 4 children lost this weekend https://t.co/JnLxWbU9JD
